description.english: Stay at maximum notoriety for 10 minutes
description.german: Bleibe 10 Minuten lang auf dem höchsten Bekanntheitsgrad.

description.english: Lower maximum notoriety by ripping wanted posters only

description.tchinese: 在最高惡名值的情況下，透過撕下懸賞佈告變成匿名狀態

description.brazilian: Com notoriedade no máximo, torne-se anônimo arrancando cartazes de procurado.

description.brazilian: Use os serviços de um Munadi 3 vezes.

description.english: Kill 5 guards with one use of Assassin Focus
description.german: Töte 5 Wachen mit einem Einsatz von Attentäter-Konzentration.
description.french: Tuez 5 gardes avec un seul emploi de Concentration d'Assassin
description.italian: Uccidi 5 guardie con un solo utilizzo della Prontezza dell’Assassino.
description.spanish: Mata a 5 guardias usando una sola vez la concentración de los Asesinos.
description.schinese: 用刺客专注一次性杀死 5 名守卫
description.tchinese: 使用刺客專注一次殺死 5 名守衛
description.russian: Убейте 5 стражников за одно использование сосредоточения ассасина
description.japanese: 「暗殺の極意」で衛兵5人を同時に倒す
description.portuguese: Mate 5 guardas com apenas um uso do Foco de Assassino.
description.polish: Zabij 5 strażników jednym użyciem asasyńskiego skupienia.
description.arabic: اقتل 5 حراس باستخدام واحد لتركيز الأساسن
description.brazilian: Mate 5 guardas com apenas um uso do Foco de Assassino.

description.french: Survivez 10 minutes en conflit ouvert
description.italian: Sopravvivi per 10 minuti in un conflitto aperto.
description.spanish: Sobrevive durante 10 minutos en conflicto abierto.
description.schinese: 在战斗中幸存 10 分钟
description.tchinese: 在公開衝突中存活 10 分鐘
description.japanese: 戦闘状態を10分間生き延びる
description.portuguese: Sobreviva em conflito aberto por 10 minutos.
description.arabic: انج لمدة 10 دقائق في اشتباك مفتوح
description.brazilian: Sobreviva em conflito aberto por 10 minutos.

description.french: Faites s'effondrer 20 échafaudages
description.spanish: Derriba 20 estructuras de andamios.
description.schinese: 弄塌 20 个脚手架
description.tchinese: 讓 20 個施工架結構倒塌
description.japanese: 足場を20個破壊する

description.english: Assassinate 10 guards in a row without triggering open conflict
description.german: Töte 10 Wachen in Folge, ohne einen offenen Kampf auszulösen.
description.french: Assassinez 10 gardes à la suite sans déclencher de conflit ouvert
description.italian: Assassina 10 guardie in serie senza scatenare un conflitto.
description.koreana: 교전을 유발하지 않고 연속으로 경비병 10명 암살하기
description.spanish: Asesina a 10 guardias seguidos sin provocar un conflicto abierto.
description.schinese: 在不触发战斗的情况下连续暗杀 10 名守卫
description.tchinese: 在不引發公開衝突的情況下連續刺殺 10 名守衛
description.russian: Убейте 10 противников подряд, не вступая в открытое столкновение
description.japanese: 戦闘状態に移行せず、衛兵を10人連続で暗殺する
description.portuguese: Assassine 10 guardas em sequência sem desencadear um conflito aberto.
description.polish: Dokonaj skrytobójstwa 10 strażników z rzędu, nie wchodząc w otwarty konflikt.
description.arabic: اغتل 10 حراس على التوالي دون إثارة اشتباك مفتوح
description.brazilian: Assassine 10 guardas em sequência sem desencadear um conflito aberto.

description.english: Hide 5 bodies in bales of hay
description.french: Cachez 5 corps dans des tas de foin
description.spanish: Oculta 5 cadáveres en fardos de heno.
description.schinese: 把 5 具尸体藏进干草堆里
description.tchinese: 將 5 具屍體藏在乾草堆中
description.japanese: 干し草に死体を5体隠す
description.portuguese: Esconda 5 corpos em montes de feno.
description.brazilian: Esconda 5 corpos em montes de feno.
